CustomField.description: Indicates the number of days after the Profile Update notification is sent that the Profile Update Status will be set to No Response. If no value is entered then no update to the status occurs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates the number of days after the Profile Update notification is sent that the Profile Update Status will be set to No Response. If no value is entered then no update to the status occurs.
CustomField.label: No Response Days
